name: nativescript-speech-recognition
description: Speech to text plugin, leveraging iOS and Android's built-in recognition engines.

scripts.postclone: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-speech-recognition && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.android.clean: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-speech-recognition && tns plugin add ../src && tns run android
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-speech-recognition && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
